mapper.sql: MESSAGEID, TITLE, TYPE, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME, FROMUSERID, IFPUBLISH, RECORDTIME
mapper.insert:
insert into OA.MESSAGE
MESSAGEID,
TITLE,
TYPE,
BEGINTIME,
ENDTIME,
FROMUSERID,
IFPUBLISH,
RECORDTIME,
CONTENT,
#{messageid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{begintime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{fromuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ifpublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{recordtime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{content,jdbcType=CLOB},
mapper.update:
update OA.MESSAGE
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BEGINTIME = #{begintime,jdbcType=DATE},
ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
FROMUSERID = #{fromuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IFPUBLISH = #{ifpublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORDTIME = #{recordtime,jdbcType=DATE},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB},
where MESSAGEID = #{messageid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update OA.MESSAGE set TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BEGINTIME = #{begintime,jdbcType=DATE}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, FROMUSERID = #{fromuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IFPUBLISH = #{ifpublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECORDTIME = #{recordtime,jdbcType=DATE}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB} where MESSAGEID = #{messageid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update OA.MESSAGE set TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BEGINTIME = #{begintime,jdbcType=DATE}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, FROMUSERID = #{fromuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IFPUBLISH = #{ifpublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECORDTIME = #{recordtime,jdbcType=DATE} where MESSAGEID = #{messageid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select * from (select B.*,rownum rn from(select m.*,u.username as uname,t.MessageTypeName as tname from Message m,UserInfo u,MessageType t where m.fromuserid=u.userid and t.MessageTypeId=m.Type and BeginTime between to_date(#{kaishi},'yyyy/MM/dd') and to_date(#{jieshu},'yyyy/MM/dd') order by m.MESSAGEID asc ) B
where rownum <=#{index} ) ua where ua.rn>#{size}
select count(*) from Message where BeginTime between to_date(#{kaishi},'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(#{jieshu},'yyyy-MM-dd')
mapper.insert: insert into Message values(Message_Seq.Nextval,#{title},#{content},#{type},to_date(#{begintime},'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss'), to_date(#{begintime},'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss')+1/24 ,#{fromuserid},#{iifpublish},sysdate);
